author: cskiraly
content:
Not sure this is the right channel, but I've prepared a script to help **local** (single-machine) Kurtosis-based testing and development.
- You can set uplink/downlink bandwidth separately, and also add some delay.
- Limits can be changed on a working testnet,  on-the-fly.
- Limits are applied separately for EL and CL, which is not too realistic, but nice when one tries to understand effects of network constraints on his own code without interference.

Still WIP, but already functional:
https://github.com/cskiraly/ethereum-kurtosis-tc
